title: Syllabus for first year

physics in first year deals with quantum mechanics .  now do not make the mistake of assuming that its going to be easy based on whatever quantum mechanics you studied in 11th and 12th physics .

this is something entirely different .

now its been quite a while since i studied engineering physics so i dont exactly remember the syllabus and shit but i should say , first unit is easy (intro to quntum mech)  , 2nd unit (schrodingers equations )  is considered tough ( but is actually super easy if you focus in class) , third unit (applications of quantum physics i think)  is irritating but not hard , 4th unit is the easiest (lasers) , 5th unit is the toughest ig .
